alert.note: Alert for Gratiot (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:08PM EDT until July 20 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gratiot County in central Michigan... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 108 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Edmore to 8 miles south of Stanton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alma... Ithaca... St. Louis... Breckenridge... Wheeler... Sumner... North Star... Ashley... Perrinton... Elm Hall... Gratiot Community Ai... Bannister... Forest Hill... Pompeii... Riverdale... Middleton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
